body_html:
I am on Windows 10, Tensorflow 1.4.0 (pip).
I do not see how my operating system and architecture are related to this question, though.

Maybe you misunderstood my question.
I would like to pass arbitrary data to my generator_fn and discriminator_fn as it is possible with tf.estimator.Estimator. This is a matter of consistency for me. I would allow reusing most of my data preprocessing already implemented for tf.estimator.Estimator.

A solution is to just remove the conversions entirely. I just don't know why they are there in the first place.

body:
I am on Windows 10, Tensorflow 1.4.0 (pip).
I do not see how my operating system and architecture are related to this question, though.

Maybe you misunderstood my question.
I would like to pass arbitrary data to my `generator_fn` and `discriminator_fn` as it is possible with `tf.estimator.Estimator`. This is a matter of consistency for me. I would allow reusing most of my data preprocessing already implemented for `tf.estimator.Estimator`.

A solution is to just remove the conversions entirely. I just don't know why they are there in the first place.
